name: Attuned_Entomb_D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Hold Duration and Reduces Endurance Cost
